articles.description: Mykhaylo Mudryk scores his first Chelsea goal as the Blues beat Fulham to climb to 11th in Premier League.
articles.title: Mudryk scores first Chelsea goal in win at Fulham

articles.description: Sir Jim Ratcliffe's Ineos Group is considering whether to offer to buy a minority stake in Manchester United in an effort to break the impasse over the ownership situation.
articles.title: Ratcliffe considering Man Utd minority stake offer

articles.description: Francis Lee will be regarded as one of the most important figures in the history of Manchester City, writes BBC Sport's Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'One of Manchester City's most important figures'

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his seventh Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who is in for second week in a row? - Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Former Liverpool defender Jamie Carragher says the situation surrounding the video assistant referee "is at crisis point" after Luis Diaz's disallowed goal in the defeat at Tottenham.
articles.title: Situation with VAR 'at crisis point' - Carragher

articles.description: BBC Sport looks back at the career of former Manchester City and England striker Francis Lee who has died aged 79.
articles.title: 'He embodied the passion of Man City' - Francis Lee obituary

articles.description: England finalise their preparation for their 50-over World Cup defence with a four-wicket win over Bangladesh in Guwahati.
articles.title: England finish World Cup prep with Bangladesh win

articles.description: England batters Tammy Beaumont and Harry Brook are named the Professional Cricketers' Association women's and men's players of the year.
articles.title: Beaumont & Brook named PCA players of the year

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at key questions around the VAR incident involving Tottenham and Liverpool and what impact the technology has had on the game.
articles.title: Liverpool v Spurs VAR Q&A - what happens now?

articles.description: Former Manchester City and England striker Francis Lee dies at the age of 79.
articles.title: Man City great Lee dies aged 79
